The MyGreenCar project

MyGreenCar is a free Android/Iphone/Web application to help customers with personalized fuel consumption. You can download the application at www.mygreencar-01.com. I have worked on the server side:

  • database structure
  • web development with Django
  • IU/IX development with D3.js
  • vehicle simulation in Python
